birth_place.en: Hong Kong Sanatorium & Hospital, Happy Valley, Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港商人及政治人物，曾担任香港特别行政区政务司司长、财政司司长及工商及科技局局长，现任全国政协常委及西九文化区管理局董事局主席。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and politician, former Chief Secretary for Administration, Financial Secretary, and Secretary for Commerce, Industry and Technology of the HKSAR. He is currently a Standing Committee Member of the CPPCC National Committee and Chairman of the Board of the West Kowloon Cultural District Authority.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年之父，香港纺织业商人，与前中共中央总书记江泽民关系密切。
description.en: Father of Henry Tang, a Hong Kong textile industrialist who had a close relationship with former CCP General Secretary Jiang Zemin.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年之妻。
description.en: Wife of Henry Tang.

description.zh-cn: 前中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第三任行政长官。
description.en: The third Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

zh-cn: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第四届行政长官选举，由梁振英击败唐英年和何俊仁当选。
description.en: The fourth Chief Executive election of the Hong Kong SAR, in which Leung Chun-ying was elected, defeating Henry Tang and Albert Ho.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年在竞选2012年香港行政长官期间，其位于九龙塘的大宅被揭发存在严重违规僭建的地库，事件严重打击其诚信和选情。
description.en: During his 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election campaign, it was revealed that Henry Tang's residence in Kowloon Tong had a large illegal basement, which severely damaged his credibility and election prospects.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第一任行政长官。
description.en: The first Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第二任行政长官。
description.en: The second Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第四任行政长官。
description.en: The fourth Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第五任行政长官。
description.en: The fifth Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区政务司司长

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政务司司长

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的首席主要官员，地位仅次于行政长官。
description.en: The Chief Secretary for Administration is the most senior principal official of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, second only to the Chief Executive.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区财政司司长

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区财政司司长

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府中掌管财政、金融及经济的最高级官员。
description.en: The Financial Secretary is the official in the Government of Hong Kong in charge of finance, treasury, and the economy.

en: Secretary for Commerce, Industry and Technology

description.zh-cn: 前香港特别行政区政府工商及科技局的负责人。
description.en: The former head of the Commerce, Industry and Technology Bureau of the Government of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 2003年为振兴香港经济而举办的大型音乐节，但因组织混乱和账目问题引发巨大争议。
description.en: A large-scale music festival held in 2003 to revitalize Hong Kong's economy, which sparked significant controversy due to organizational chaos and accounting issues.

description.zh-cn: 前香港投资推广署署长，因维港巨星汇事件与唐英年产生争议。
description.en: Former Director-General of Investment Promotion in Hong Kong, who had a dispute with Henry Tang over the Harbour Fest event.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织，是中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, serving as the organizational form of the patriotic united front of the Chinese people.

description.zh-cn: 负责发展及营运香港西九文化区的法定机构。
description.en: A statutory body responsible for developing and operating the West Kowloon Cultural District in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一个亲商界、亲建制派政党。
description.en: A pro-business and pro-establishment political party in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的顶尖公立研究型大学。
description.en: A top public research university located in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 香港总商会总裁，曾任唐英年的政务助理，被传与唐英年有婚外情。
description.en: CEO of the Hong Kong General Chamber of Commerce, former political assistant to Henry Tang, and rumored to have had an extramarital affair with him.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年是唐翔千的儿子。
description.en: Henry Tang is the son of Tang Hsiang-chien.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年与郭妤浅于1984年结婚。
description.en: Henry Tang and Lisa Kuo Yu-chien married in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年的父亲唐翔千与江泽民甚有渊源，二人称兄道弟。
description.en: Henry Tang's father, Tang Hsiang-chien, had a deep connection with Jiang Zemin, and they referred to each other as brothers.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年承认自己年轻时曾多次与江泽民见面，两人关系甚佳。
description.en: Henry Tang admitted to having met Jiang Zemin multiple times in his youth, stating they had a very good relationship.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区政务司司长

description.zh-cn: 唐英年于2007年至2011年期间担任香港特别行政区政务司司长。
description.en: Henry Tang served as the Chief Secretary for Administration of the HKSAR from 2007 to 2011.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区财政司司长

description.zh-cn: 唐英年于2003年至2007年期间担任香港特别行政区财政司司长。
description.en: Henry Tang served as the Financial Secretary of the HKSAR from 2003 to 2007.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年于2002年至2003年期间担任工商及科技局局长。
description.en: Henry Tang served as the Secretary for Commerce, Industry and Technology from 2002 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年曾两度出任西九文化区管理局董事局主席，第一任期为2010年至2011年，第二任期自2017年开始，预计至2025年结束。
description.en: Henry Tang has twice served as the Chairman of the Board of the West Kowloon Cultural District Authority, with his first term from 2010 to 2011 and his second term starting in 2017, expected to end in 2025.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 唐英年自2013年起担任全国政协常务委员。
description.en: Henry Tang has served as a Standing Committee Member of the CPPCC National Committee since 2013.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年在1993年至2002年期间为自由党成员，后因加入政府而退党。
description.en: Henry Tang was a member of the Liberal Party from 1993 to 2002, leaving the party to join the government.

relationships.source: 2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举

description.zh-cn: 唐英年在2012年香港特别行政区行政长官选举中，以285票对689票败于梁振英，未能当选。
description.en: In the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election, Henry Tang was defeated by Leung Chun-ying with 285 votes to 689, failing to be elected.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年行政长官选举期间，唐英年与梁振英为主要竞争对手。唐英年在选举辩论中公开指责梁振英曾建议出动防暴队对付示威者，并试图打压言论自由。
description.en: During the 2012 Chief Executive election, Henry Tang and Leung Chun-ying were main rivals. In a televised debate, Tang publicly accused Leung of having suggested deploying riot police against protesters and attempting to suppress freedom of speech.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年大宅的僭建风波严重损害了他的公众诚信，成为其竞选行政长官失败的关键因素之一。
description.en: The illegal basement controversy at Henry Tang's residence severely damaged his public credibility and was a key factor in his failure to win the Chief Executive election.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年在记者会上声称，其大宅的僭建地库是在夫妻感情低潮期时，由其妻郭妤浅主导建造的。
description.en: At a press conference, Henry Tang claimed that the illegal basement at his residence was built under the direction of his wife, Lisa Kuo Yu-chien, during a low point in their marital relationship.

description.zh-cn: 在董建华担任行政长官期间，唐英年先后出任工商及科技局局长（2002-2003）和财政司司长（2003-2005）。
description.en: During Tung Chee-hwa's tenure as Chief Executive, Henry Tang served as Secretary for Commerce, Industry and Technology (2002-2003) and subsequently as Financial Secretary (2003-2005).

description.zh-cn: 在曾荫权担任行政长官期间，唐英年先后出任财政司司长（2005-2007）和政务司司长（2007-2011）。
description.en: During Donald Tsang's tenure as Chief Executive, Henry Tang served as Financial Secretary (2005-2007) and subsequently as Chief Secretary for Administration (2007-2011).

description.zh-cn: 唐英年作为“维港巨星汇”专责小组主席，因活动监管不力而备受批评。后续的司法复核中，法官更形容其“玩政治花招”，事件损害了其声誉。
description.en: As chairman of the task force for the 'Harbour Fest', Henry Tang was heavily criticized for poor oversight of the event. In a subsequent judicial review, a judge described his actions as 'playing political games', which damaged his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 因维港巨星汇事件，时任投资推广署署长卢维思被裁定失职。他随后提出司法覆核，并揭发唐英年试图修改会议纪录以推卸责任，最终卢维思胜诉。
description.en: Following the Harbour Fest event, Mike Rowse, then Director-General of Investment Promotion, was found guilty of misconduct. He later filed for a judicial review, revealing that Henry Tang had attempted to alter meeting minutes to evade responsibility. Rowse ultimately won the case.

description.zh-cn: 时任行政长官林郑月娥于2017年9月18日委任唐英年出任西九文化区管理局董事局主席。
description.en: On September 18, 2017, then-Chief Executive Carrie Lam appointed Henry Tang as the Chairman of the Board of the West Kowloon Cultural District Authority.

description.zh-cn: 行政长官李家超于2023年再度委任唐英年为西九文化区管理局主席，任期至2025年。
description.en: In 2023, Chief Executive John Lee re-appointed Henry Tang as the Chairman of the West Kowloon Cultural District Authority for a term extending to 2025.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年承认自己曾有“感情缺失”，而外界广泛传闻其婚外情对象之一是其前政务助理袁莎妮，但双方均否认有感情关系。
description.en: Henry Tang admitted to having an 'emotional affair,' and it was widely rumored that one of his extramarital partners was his former political assistant, Shirley Yuen, although both parties denied any romantic relationship.

description.zh-cn: 在处理新界村屋僭建问题上，唐英年主张“以和为贵”，与时任发展局局长林郑月娥严厉执法的立场产生冲突。
description.en: Regarding the issue of unauthorized building works in New Territories village houses, Henry Tang advocated for a conciliatory approach, clashing with the strict enforcement stance of then-Secretary for Development Carrie Lam.
